scene_description_enriched: A saintly figure, clad in an orange robe and with a halo, stands to the left, gesturing with open hands towards a small, fortified structure. Within this structure, a man with a beard and chains around his wrists and ankles is seated, looking upwards. Another figure, possibly a woman, is partially visible behind him. The background depicts a green, hilly landscape with some foliage. The scene is framed by an ornate border with blue and gold patterns.
scene_interpretation: Saint John the Baptist Preaching to the Prisoners
